views.description: Add a friend into the group chat with the given id. The request user must be in the chat, and the target user must be friend with the request user.

postParams.description: The id of the chat to add the user to

views.return: <response status 200, or 4xx if the request is invalid>

views.description: Remove a user from the group chat. You must have admin privilege to perform this action. If the target user is admin, the request user must be creator (leader) of the group chat.

views.return: <response status 200, or 4xx if the request is invalid>

views.description: Remove admin privileges from a person in the group chat. The request user must be creator (leader) of the group chat.

postParams.description: The id of the group chat to remove admin privileges from the target user

postParams.description: The username of the target user to remove admin privileges

views.return: <response status 200, or 4xx if the request is invalid>

views.description: Assign another user as creator (leader) of the group chat. The request user must be current creator (leader) of the indicated group chat.

postParams.description: The id of the group chat to transfer leadership

postParams.description: The username of the target user to assign as new leader

views.return: <response status 200, or 4xx if the request is invalid>
